item.title: Vacancy in Blockchain Project
item.description:
Project Details

Smart contracts (Blockchains) have a potential to disrupt the digital technology platforms by ensuring security, privacy, and trust. In this project, we envisage to create a trusted Blockchain application that can serve as mobility-as-a-service(MaaS) platform. The goals of the project are two fold:

  • Create a blockchain mobile application for traceability of goods and facilitiate reputation scoring mechanism.

  • Create a testing tool to automatically test smart contracts against known safety and security vulnerabilities and synthesize smart contract implementations by using data-driven and deductive approaches.

The project is funded by DENSO Corporation and DST-JST grant on IoT security. The project position related details are given in the table below:

Post: Project Scientist or Assistant
Eligibility: BTech degree in Computer Science and Engineering or Electrical Engineering (GATE score is preferable).
Skills:
  • Proficiency in at least one of the following languages: C++, Java, GoLang.
  • Experience with Ethereum or Hyperledger fabric blockchain platforms is preferable.
  • Experience with cross platform mobile app development is preferable (such as React native, Javascript).
Pay and Contract: Starting from 38k/month. Contract for one year (extendible to 2 years based on performance).

All interested candidates may send email with a copy of their recent CV to Prof. Subodh Sharma, CSE, IIT Delhi (Email: svs@iitd.ac.in) with the subject “Application for the post of Project Assistant“ by 2nd December, 2020 .
